name: blog-microservices
description: Blog Microservices - User, Author, Blog services + Frontend

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:author" "npm run dev:blog" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:author: cd services/author && npm run dev
scripts.install:all: concurrently "npm install --prefix services/user" "npm install --prefix services/author" "npm install --prefix services/blog" "npm install --prefix frontend"
scripts.build:all: concurrently "npm run build --prefix services/user" "npm run build --prefix services/author" "npm run build --prefix services/blog" "npm run build --prefix frontend"
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start --prefix services/user" "npm run start --prefix services/author" "npm run start --prefix services/blog" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:user && npm run lint:author && npm run lint:blog
scripts.lint:author: npm run lint --prefix services/author
scripts.format: npm run format:user && npm run format:author && npm run format:blog
scripts.format:author: npm run format --prefix services/author
